title: Tiesto - Global Harmony
description:
As the world joins together for the Beijing 2008 Olympic Games this summer, Coca-Cola invited TiÃƒÂ«sto to produce a track that properly expresses what the occasion means to him.

TiÃƒÂ«sto had been provided with a theme and using his music as his form of expression, he created a song that expanded on his inspiration, drawn from the theme. The title of the track he created is &#039;Global Harmony&#039;.

The collaboration is based on the contribution of Chinese visual artist Xiao Xue who designed a new limited-edition Coca-Cola bottle. The graphic arts featured in the design, were then united with TiÃƒÂ«sto&#039;s track, thus showing the basis of the concept: the possibilities that emerge when cultures of all parts of the world come together.

Both the artistic and cultural exchange of this first ever project resulted in a total of eight limited-edition aluminum contour bottles by the title &#039;WE8&#039;, which refers to the collaboration between West and East around eight different themes.
